wikipedia_page.main: Sushil Baldev Wadhwani  (born 7 December 1959) was a member of the Bank of England's Monetary Policy Committee from June 1999 to May 2002. He did his schooling from Mayo College, Ajmer, and his further education at Stanmore Sixth Form College. He is also the founder and chief executive officer of Wadhwani Asset Management.

link_mentions.page: List of people associated with the London School of Economics

response: |  Sushil Wadhwani, CBE || Central Banker ||  Bank of England Monetary policy Committee. Former London School of Economics Reader (7 years), he was appointed a full-time independent member of the Monetary Policy Committee after various private sector roles including Director, Equity Strategy at Goldman Sachs.
